title: "Olaf wtf why dont u give me red"
body:
*goes afk*
When we lose the game I ask him, are you a female? Guess what, it was a girl. I could tell by the amount of drama and bitching she made. Olaf and Gnar were trolling. Which I mean is annoying but they are having fun in their way. But the fact that you come to League of Legends to get attention by making drama is so pathetic. Daddy doesn't give you any?

P.s I love how I could tell it was a female
